author: Massimo Marchiano
title: NBA 2K24 2KTV Episode 18 Answers
text: NBA 2K24 2KTV Episode 18 aired tonight, and we got the answers to help you earn some much needed VC. For newcomers, NBA 2KTV is a weekly program available in-game, hosted by Alexis Morgan and Chris Manning. Overall, the show features a wide variety of content, from creator builds, developer interviews, announcements, and more. However. we know most fans love to watch for the free VC from answering questions. NBA 2K24 2KTV Episode 18 Answers ‚Äì All Answers For Episode 18 - Assists - 13 - Jump Pass - Gold - Touch Passer - 0 - Jimmy - Two Step - Big Driver - Unpluckable - ATM - High-Risk Overall, those are all the answers for NBA 2K24 2KTV Episode 18. We hope this guide helped you earn some VC. Furthermore, the show provides the easies way to earn VC in-game just by watching the program. Generally, the show typically gives viewers enough time to read over and answer the question. However, just make sure you take your time to ensure you answer the question correctly. Each episode only allows you one chance to answer, so watch it when prepared. To answer a question, just press the correct answer corresponding button. Additionally, the show sometimes throws in a few freebies now and then. So even if you make a few mistakes, you still earn something for your troubles. Overall, 2KTV offers the easiest way to earn in-game rewards since you literally just get to sit back, relax, and watch. We recommend visiting any of the old episodes, if you haven't caught them, yet. We also recommend it for those times you need to wait for something to download, or for a friend to hop online. New episodes typically [release every week](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL8ozxhwwmz4LJzpGAj22T5qa0ZVFBJ3yw), usually on Fridays. However, we've seen a couple of exceptions this year, with both the Thanksgiving and New Years specials. However, most episode For more [NBA 2K](/tag/nba-2k) content, check out the latest Locker Codes. Many codes from the #25Daysof2K event are still active until January 12th, so make sure to redeem them for free VC, cosmetics, and more. Additionally, NBA 2K24 Season 4 begins next week, with tons of new content on the way. For more [gaming](https://clutchpoints.com/gaming) and [NBA](https://clutchpoints.com/nba) news, visit [ClutchPoints](https://clutchpoints.com/).

author: New York Post
title: Michigan worker claims company threatened to fire him if he didn‚Äôt join labor union
text:
Four months after Michigan repealed its right-to-work law, more workers are filing lawsuits against their employers for trying to force union membership.
Right-to-work laws ensure employees do not lose their job for refusing to join a labor union.
Even without those laws, U.S. Supreme Court case Janus v. AFSCME (2018) ruled it unconstitutional for labor unions to extract agency fees from nonconsenting, non-union member public employees.
But some unions and employers are still trying to force employees to join and financially support the union as a condition of employment, according to the National Right to Work Foundation .
Most recently, Joseph Arnold, a Meijer employee in Sault Ste. Marie, filed charges with the National Labor Relations Board against Meijer management for threatening to fire him if he didn‚Äôt complete a United Food and Commercial Workers union membership form.
‚ÄúEven though Michigan isn‚Äôt a right-to-work state anymore, that doesn‚Äôt give my employer agency to dictate my options,‚Äù said Arnold, ‚ÄúThrough ignorance or intent, Meijer threatening my job because I don‚Äôt want to associate with the union is unacceptable. If Meijer truly respects our rights they would present us with all options, as it is the job of the union to advocate my interests with my employer, not the job of my employer to advocate the interests of the union with me.‚Äù
Meijer and UFCW did not respond to requests for comment.
‚ÄúBased on the cases that Foundation attorneys have already fielded in the short time that Michigan‚Äôs right-to-work law has been repealed, it‚Äôs clear that Michigan workers need more protection from coercive union power, not less,‚Äù National Right to Work Foundation President Mark Mix said.
‚ÄúUnion officials and complicit employers will often push the boundaries of what‚Äôs legal in an attempt to extend union power over workers regardless of whether they want or asked for the union.‚Äù
The UFCW says on its website ‚ÄúWe work with people in grocery stores all across the country to get them the wages and benefits they deserve ‚Äî all backed by a union contract.‚Äù
The post Michigan worker claims company threatened to fire him if he didn‚Äôt join labor union appeared first on New York Post .

author: Zonebourse
title: La production de Boeing en partie paralys√©e par sa premi√®re gr√®ve depuis 2008 - Zonebourse
text:
Seattle (awp/afp) - Plusieurs dizaines de milliers d'ouvriers de Boeing ont lanc√© vendredi une gr√®ve sans pr√©c√©dent depuis seize ans, bloquant notamment la production dans son berceau de la c√¥te nord-ouest am√©ricaine.
L'arr√™t de travail a d√©but√© dans le sillage du rejet massif du projet de nouvelle convention collective, n√©goci√© depuis le 8 mars par Boeing et l'antenne locale du syndicat des machinistes (IAM-District 751) et qui devait succ√©der √† celle datant de 2008 qui expirait jeudi √† minuit.
Les plus de 33.000 syndiqu√©s de l'avionneur dans la r√©gion de Seattle - sur quelque 170.000 employ√©s du groupe - ont rejet√© l'accord annonc√© le 8 septembre √† 94,6% et approuv√© un d√©brayage √† 96%, selon Jon Holden, pr√©sident de l'IAM-District 751.
"La gr√®ve commence √† minuit", a-t-il lanc√© lors d'un point de presse jeudi soir, au cours duquel il a annonc√© un recours contre Boeing aupr√®s de l'agence f√©d√©rale charg√©e du droit du travail (NRLB) pour pratiques d√©loyales pendant les n√©gociations.
La derni√®re gr√®ve chez l'avionneur am√©ricain, en 2008, avait dur√© 57 jours.
Face au m√©contentement des adh√©rents, M. Holden avait toutefois affirm√© ne pouvoir "garantir que nous obtiendrons davantage en faisant gr√®ve".
Ce mouvement social paralysait d√®s vendredi matin les deux grandes usines d'assemblage de Renton et d'Everett, qui produisent le 737 MAX - best-seller de Boeing -, le 777 et le 767 (version cargo et ravitailleur militaire), dont les livraisons cumulent d√©j√† les retards.
La production d'autres sites, notamment une usine de pi√®ces d√©tach√©es √† Portland (Oregon) tout proche, √©taient √©galement √† l'arr√™t, tout comme le r√©usinage de dizaines de 787 Dreamliner effectu√© √† Everett depuis plusieurs mois.
En revanche, l'assemblage du Dreamliner n'√©tait pas perturb√©e √† ce stade car l'usine se trouve en Caroline du Sud (est) et n'est pas concern√©e par cette convention collective.
"Chancelant"
L'avionneur encaisse la plus grosse partie du paiement (environ 60%) √† la remise des avions. Il peut livrer les avions ayant re√ßu le feu vert du r√©gulateur FAA avant la gr√®ve mais son rythme de production fonctionne au ralenti depuis un incident en vol d√©but janvier sur un 737 MAX 9 d'Alaska Airlines.
"Pour un Boeing financi√®rement chancelant, une gr√®ve est la derni√®re chose dont il avait besoin", a relev√© le site sp√©cialis√© dans l'aviation Leeham News,
Selon les analystes de TD Cowen, une gr√®ve de 50 jours priverait Boeing de 3 √† 3,5 milliards de dollars de liquidit√©s et aurait un impact de 5,5 milliards sur le chiffre d'affaires.
"Le message selon lequel l'accord de principe conclu avec les dirigeants de l'IAM n'est pas acceptable pour ses membres est clair", a r√©agi Boeing. "Nous restons engag√©s √† r√©initialiser notre relation avec nos employ√©s et avec le syndicat, et nous sommes pr√™ts √† retourner √† la table des n√©gociations pour parvenir √† un nouvel accord", a-t-il poursuivi.
Une semaine apr√®s sa prise de fonction le 8 ao√ªt, le nouveau patron de l'avionneur Kelly Ortberg s'√©tait engag√© √† "r√©initialiser" cette relation.
Vers 14H00 GMT, l'action Boeing chutait de 2,66% √† la Bourse de New York.
La convention collective rejet√©e pr√©voyait une hausse salariale de 25% sur quatre ans, un engagement d'investissements dans la r√©gion, ainsi que la construction du prochain avion - annonc√© pour 2035 - dans le berceau historique de l'avionneur, ce qui devait assurer des emplois pour plusieurs d√©cennies.
Boeing esp√©rait que ces concessions suffiraient √† esquiver une gr√®ve. Sa situation financi√®re est pr√©caire depuis le crash de deux 737 MAX 8 en 2018 et en 2019 (346 morts), et moult probl√®mes de qualit√© de la production.
"Ce n'est un secret pour personne: notre activit√© traverse une p√©riode difficile, en partie √† cause de nos propres erreurs du pass√©. (...) Une gr√®ve mettrait en p√©ril notre reprise commune", avait pr√©venu mercredi soir M. Ortberg, exhortant les employ√©s √† ne pas "sacrifier" les progr√®s futurs en raison de "frustrations li√©es au pass√©".
Mais les m√©contents jugent la hausse salariale trop √©loign√©e des demandes du syndicat (+40% initialement) et le volet sur les retraites insatisfaisant. "On nous a brad√©s", a lanc√© jeudi √† l'AFP Kamie Bryan, employ√©e chez Boeing depuis 18 ans.
"Ils parlent d'une augmentation de 25%, mais ce n'est pas le cas", a d√©clar√© Paul Janousek, estimant que la pr√©sentation par Boeing √©tait "trompeuse". Selon cet √©lectricien de 55 ans, dont treize chez Boeing, son augmentation n'atteindrait qu'environ 9% du fait de la suppression d'une prime annuelle.
Selon le r√®glement de l'IAM, les gr√©vistes recevront 250 dollars par semaine √† partir de la troisi√®me semaine d'arr√™t de travail.
afp/rp

author: Patrick
title: MU Extension takes to the skies to stamp out invasive weeds
text:
WILLIAMSBURG, Mo. ‚Äì University of Missouri Extension is taking to the skies to identify and map invasive weed species in one of mid-Missouri‚Äôs prized native prairie areas.
MU Extension state natural resource specialist Michael Sunde is using drone-based lidar and imagery along with satellite imagery and machine learning to make 3D maps of vegetation and land cover at Prairie Fork Conservation Area, which is in eastern Callaway County near Williamsburg.
Data gathered during the two-year project will be extrapolated to create maps and 3D forest models to locate unwanted plant species.
This is the first time a drone has been used to make precision maps at the location, Sunde says. Aerial photos previously taken provided good information but lacked the detail that a drone flying closer to the ground can provide.
The information will help conservationists rid the natural prairie grasslands of two invasive weeds ‚Äì bush honeysuckle and sericea lespedeza ‚Äì that edge out preferred grasses.
MU Extension‚Äôs Missouri Resource Assessment Partnership (MoRAP) assists with the Prairie Fork project to develop, analyze and deliver geospatial data for environmental resource planning and management.
The Prairie Fork Charitable Endowment supports the 711-acre Prairie Fork Conservation Area. It is managed by the MU School of Natural Resources and the Missouri Department of Conservation.
Prairie Fork‚Äôs grasslands are treasured by conservationists and educators because only 5% of Missouri land remains as a natural prairie with diverse plants, wildlife and insect life. Prior to statehood in 1821, Missouri had at least 15 million acres of prairie grass, according to the Missouri Prairie Foundation.
Data extrapolated from aerial images will provide information that can help conservationists locate and eradicate invasive weeds in the natural grasslands at Prairie Fork Conservation Area. Photo courtesy of Michael Sunde. ‚ÄìMU Extension

author: Correio do Povo
title: Confira as notas dos jogadores do Gr√™mio no empate com o Corinthians pelo Brasileir√£o
text: Confira as notas dos jogadores do Gr√™mio no empate com o Corinthians pelo Brasileir√£o Resultado frustrante na reta final mant√©m o Tricolor da zona de rebaixamento publicidade Com pol√™mica de arbitragem, o [Gr√™mio cedeu o empate ao Corinthians em 2 a 2](https://www.correiodopovo.com.br/esportes/gr%C3%AAmio/gr%C3%AAmio-empata-com-corinthians-em-jogo-de-p%C3%AAnalti-pol%C3%AAmico-e-segue-no-z4-do-brasileir%C3%A3o-1.1516112) na noite desta quinta-feira e permanece na zona de rebaixamento do Brasileir√£o ap√≥s 17 jogos. O Tricolor saiu na frente, sofreu a igualdade em penalidade apontada pelo VAR e conseguiu assumir a vantagem em gola√ßo do volante Villasanti na segunda etapa. Nos minutos finais, a defesa deu liberdade para o meia Garro bater colocado e superar o argentino Marchesin em outro belo gol para explodir a NeoQuimica Arena. Confira as notas dos jogadores do Gr√™mio: Marche: N√£o teve culpa nos gols e fez duas boas defesas quando os donos da casa intensificaram a press√£o. Nota 6,5. Fabio: Teve dificuldades para neutralizar os avan√ßos dos pontas corinthianos. Nota 5,5. Kannemann: Conseguiu neutralizar os giros de Yuri Alberto. Envolvido no lance do p√™nalti apontado pelo VAR. Nota 5. Jemerson: Em sua estreia, deu espa√ßo demais para Garro finalizar no gol de empate. Nota 4,5. Rodrigo Ely: Marcou um gol de cabe√ßa, teve outras chances e venceu todas pelo alto na defesa. Nota 7. Reinaldo: N√£o teve tantos problemas para marcar, mas n√£o aproveitou os espa√ßos para apoiar. Nota 5,5. Villasanti: Aproveitou vacilo da defesa e marcou um gola√ßo. Nota 7. Edenilson: Ajudou a circular a bola pelo meio de campo, mas n√£o t√£o inspirado como em outros jogos. Nota 5,5. Nathan: Teve dificuldades para segurar a bola no setor ofensivo. Desarmado com facilidade. Nota 4,5. Cristaldo: Voltando de les√£o, girou e circulou a bola, mas sem grandes impactos. Nota 5. Soteldo: Melhor do Gr√™mio. Criou o lance do primeiro gol com talento individual e sempre levou perigo pela esquerda. Nota 7,5. Renato Portaluppi: Estrat√©gia inicial n√£o gerou o impacto esperado. Conseguiu acertar o time no intervalo. Nota 6. Gustavo Nunes: Fez seu papel de explorar contragolpes em velocidade. Nota 5,5. Pep√™: Desligado. Perdeu duas posses de bola que originaram perigo para o Corinthians. Nota 4. Jo√£o Pedro: Entrou mais ligado no ataque e quase fez um gol em chute de fora da √°rea. Nota 6. Arezo: Sem nota. Du Queiroz: Sem nota.

author: @DailyUrduPoint
title: Caretaker Federal Minister for Religious Affairs Aneeq Ahmed visits churches, temples to promote love for humanity
text: Home Pakistan News Caretaker Federal Minister for Religious Affairs Aneeq Ahmed visits churches, temples to promote lov .. Caretaker Federal Minister For Religious Affairs Aneeq Ahmed Visits Churches, Temples To Promote Love For Humanity Fahad Shabbir (@FahadShabbir) Published December 29, 2023 | 11:34 PM Caretaker Federal Minister for Religious Affairs Aneeq Ahmed on Friday visited churches and temples in the Sindh metropolis to promote interfaith harmony in the country KARACHI, (UrduPoint / Pakistan Point News - 29th Dec, 2023) Caretaker Federal Minister for Religious Affairs Aneeq Ahmed on Friday visited churches and temples in the Sindh metropolis to promote interfaith harmony in the country. "Today, we visited different churches, temples and a Gurdwara to give a message of love for humanity," he said while talking to media persons. The minister said that islam "teaches about the importance of humanity". "We all are humans, whether we belong to Muslim Sikh, Hindu or Christian communities. We should take care of one another and sympathize during the trying times and share happiness in good times." Aneeq said that https://www.urdupoint.com/pakistan/ was a peace-loving country, with a 97 per cent Muslim population and three per cent minorities, but they all lived in peace and united. Besides St. Patrick's Cathedral Church and Holy Trinity Church, the minister visited Gurdwara Guru Nanak Darbar Swami Narain Mandir.

organizations.name: home pakistan news caretaker federal minister for religious affairs

author: Not√≠cias ao Minuto
title: Jogadores da sele√ß√£o nacional surpreendidos no Dia do Pai. Eis as rea√ß√µes
text:
A Federa√ß√£o Portuguesa de Futebol (FPF) divulgou um v√≠deo, esta quarta-feira, a mostrar a surpresa preparada para os jogadores da sele√ß√£o nacional nas comemora√ß√µes do Dia do Pai.
Ainda antes da partida da comitiva √†s ordens de Roberto Mart√≠nez com destino √† Dinamarca, para as decis√µes da Liga das Na√ß√µes, todos os internacionais lusos que j√° foram pais depararam-se com uma caixa nos seus lugares √† mesa, na Cidade do Futebol - l√° encontravam-se camisolas em que se liam os nomes dos respetivos filhos.

author: Redacci√≥
title: Ultres a mata-degolla: la guerra soterrada entre Vox i Alvise pels votants d'extrema dreta
text: 06.06.2024 - 21:40 | Actualitzaci√≥: 06.06.2024 - 22:55 L‚Äôonada ultra que recorre la Uni√≥ Europea canviar√† la configuraci√≥ de l‚Äôeurocambra despr√©s de les [ eleccions europees](https://www.vilaweb.cat/eleccions-europees-2024-tota-informacio/) de diumenge. A l‚Äôestat espanyol, els sondatges preveuen un salt endavant de Vox, que podria arribar fins als sis eurodiputats, amb gaireb√© el 10% dels vots. Tanmateix, Santiago Abascal continuar√† essent el germ√† petit de Marine Le Pen, Giorgia Meloni i Viktor Orb√°n. Vox ha estat incapa√ß de tombar el PP i veu com al seu jard√≠ apareixen follets famolencs que poden menjar-se‚Äôn les flors. Una de les amenaces principals √©s l‚Äôinfluenciador d‚Äôextrema dreta Luis, Alvise, P√©rez, que despr√©s d‚Äôhaver actuat a l‚Äôempara de Vox ‚Äìanteriorment, havia passat per Uni√≥n Progreso y Democracia i Ciutadans‚Äì ara es promociona com una mena de Cid Campeador que cavalca per les xarxes socials amb missatges populistes, not√≠cies falses i v√≠deos virals en contra de la partitocr√†cia, el sanchisme, la corrupci√≥, l‚Äôindependentisme, el feminisme i la immigraci√≥ il¬∑legal. Alvise no √©s gaire diferent del Santiago Abascal que el 2015 predicava la bona nova ultra sobre un banc amb un meg√†fon davant la indifer√®ncia dels transe√ºnts del carrer de l‚ÄôAsunci√≥n de Sevilla. De totes maneres, l‚Äôinfluenciador va molt m√©s ben armat per escampar el seu fum i mentides. T√© centenars de milers de seguidors a Instagram (842.000), Telegram (480.800, i 67.400 m√©s en un xat obert), YouTube (280.000), Facebook (223.000) i TikTok (129.000). De cara al p√∫blic, la direcci√≥ de Vox fa veure que l‚Äôinfluenciador no √©s un problema. ‚ÄúNo s√© qu√® diu l‚ÄôAlvise‚Ä¶ Nosaltres tenim les idees molt clares, podem equivocar-nos, per√≤ no enganyem ning√∫, no tra√Øm, no som deslleials amb els nostres votats‚Äù, ha dit el vice-president i cap de llista a les europees, [ Jorge Buxad√©](https://www.vilaweb.cat/noticies/erc-buxade-salutacio-nazi-parlament-europeu/), en una entrevista a [ El Pa√≠s](https://elpais.com/espana/2024-06-05/buxade-con-milei-meloni-le-pen-o-viktor-orban-nos-une-un-enemigo-comun.html). Dit aix√≤, els sondatges s√≠ que han fet saltar les alarmes a la seu de Vox. Dilluns, [el darrer dia que es podien publicar enquestes](https://www.vilaweb.cat/noticies/allau-enquestes-pp-guanyaria-eleccions-europees-extrema-dreta/), l‚ÄôABC, el Grup PRISA, El Peri√≥dico i el CIS assenyalaven que Se Acab√≥ la Fiesta (SALF), la marca d‚ÄôAlvise, far√† forat en l‚Äôelectorat extremista i entrar√† al Parlament Europeu. De fet, el sondatge del CIS li atorgava la cinquena pla√ßa amb un 5% dels vots, √©s a dir, entre Sumar i Ara Rep√∫bliques. Aix√≠ mateix, tamb√© feia una radiografia del seu perfil de votant: home i menor de trenta-cinc anys. Segons el CIS, SALF arreplegar√† vots del PP i Ciutadans, per√≤ el gruix provindr√† de Vox, concretament el 20%. La c√∫pula de la formaci√≥ d‚Äôextrema dreta ha filtrat als mitjans afins el seu malestar per aquestes dades i assegura que l‚Äôenquesta no s‚Äôaguanta per enlloc. En aquest sentit, culpa el govern espanyol d‚Äôinflar les possibilitats electorals d‚ÄôAlvise, a qui menyspreen i defineixen com un ‚Äúfriqui‚Äù, tot i que reconeixen que pot fer-los mal i ser eurodiputat. Ultres a mata-degolla Alvise es va acostar a Vox despr√©s d‚Äôhaver abandonat Ciutadans, on va partir peres amb Toni Cant√≥, especialment per la seva radicalitat. El flirteig amb les files d‚ÄôAbascal no va ser gaire llarg. La seva afecci√≥ a participar en actes d‚ÄôHazte O√≠r i la pand√®mia van esquerdar i rebentar la relaci√≥. El detonant va ser la persecuci√≥ que va instigar contra el diputat Juan Luis Steegman ‚Äìque ha abandonat el partit fa poc‚Äì, que √©s metge de professi√≥. Alvise el va acusar de cobrar morterades de les farmac√®utiques per defensar la vaccinaci√≥. Vox, fins i tot, va emetre un comunicat per a desmentir l‚Äôinfluenciador. Sense l‚Äôempara de cap sigla, ha fet servir la ‚Äúcomunitat‚Äù, √©s a dir, els seguidors a les xarxes socials, com a modus vivendi, tot i que al¬∑lega que l‚Äôajuden amb la seva activitat pol√≠tica, com ara les protestes davant les seus del PSOE, amb donacions en plataformes de micromecenatge, bizums i transfer√®ncies banc√†ries. D‚Äôaltra banda, fora del radar de Vox, ha intensificat els seus atacs a dirigents, com el diputat Jacobo Robatto, a qui ha assenyalat per suposada corrupci√≥ urban√≠stica a Torrelodones (Madrid), cosa que l‚Äôajuntament ha negat. Alvise tamb√© ha apuntat directament a Abascal, a qui ha acusat de fer servir la Fundaci√≥n Disenso per pagar sobresous a c√†rrecs de Vox, com ara, el diputat i ex-cap al Parlament de les Illes, [ Jorge Campos](https://www.vilaweb.cat/etiqueta/jorge-campos/). Tot plegat, mentre es reuneix i es deixa afalagar per ex-alts c√†rrecs de Vox, com ara [ Iv√°n Espinosa de los Monteros](https://www.vilaweb.cat/noticies/crisi-interna-vox-espinosa-monteros-deixa-partit/) i Macarena Olona, que van sortir escaldats de les files ultres. ‚ÄúEl tauler pol√≠tic espanyol necessita una gran sacseja‚Äù, va piular l‚Äôex-diputada. Ahora que os tengo por aqu√≠, es inmoral se√±alar a familiares an√≥nimos. No conozco al padre de Alvise, pero s√≠ a su hermano, Guardia Civil, servidor p√∫blico. Ninguno de los dos tiene nada que ver con la pol√≠tica, y vosotros les hab√©is arrastrado por el fango. Vuestras‚Ä¶ [https://t.co/MPlZi8bBKh] ‚Äî Macarena Olona (@Macarena_Olona) [May 26, 2024] De moment, la resposta de Vox s‚Äôha centrat sobretot a menysprear Alvise, la seva capacitat d‚Äôinflu√®ncia i el ress√≤ de la seva maquin√†ria de not√≠cies falses. En un √†udio filtrat, la diputada Cristina Esteban el defineix com un delinq√ºent. ‚ÄúS√© que t√© molts fans, per√≤, per comen√ßar, √©s un tros de corrupte. No √©s Robin Hood. √âs un paio molt fosc. El conec personalment i he estat reunit amb ell i √©s fosc de collons. Per√≤ t√© un club de fans i sembla que investiga i resulta que roba la informaci√≥. √âs un horror‚Äù, diu. Ara, m√©s enll√† de les desqualificacions, all√≤ que ha descol¬∑locat m√©s Alvise √©s un compte de Twitter an√≤nim presumptament vinculat al partit d‚Äôextrema dreta. El Jud√≠o de Vox, que √©s el nom de l‚Äôusuari, es dedica a fer enfilalls per a denunciar que viu de fabricar mentides, de vendre‚Äôs al millor postor ‚Äìfins i tot insinua que ha cobrat de Juan Carlos i de Pedro J.‚Äì i de malgastar els diners que recapta dels seus seguidors. üî¥üßµüî¥üßµüî¥üßµ Hola, Alvise: S√© que estos hilos no te gustan. Que piensas que son una campa√±a de desprestigio para perjudicar su candidatura. Que vienen directamente desde Vox, o que tenemos miedo de que saques un esca√±o. Pero no. Muy fr√≠o, Luis. (1) [pic.twitter.com/aGSXEFp8JE] ‚Äî eljudiodevox (@eljudiodevox) [May 26, 2024] L‚Äôinfluenciador ha assegurat que el responsable del compte de Twitter √©s Paul Daniel Axinte, regidor de Vox a Salou, que fa poc [ va agredir un ex-membre del partit a Tarragona](https://www.vilaweb.cat/noticies/regidor-vox-agredeix-excompany-partit-ple-ajuntament-tarragona/). ‚ÄúLa informaci√≥ publicada per Alvise sobre mi √©s absolutament falsa. No tinc res a veure amb el compte El Jud√≠o de Vox ‚Äìque continua publicant‚Äì, presentar√© una querella per inj√∫ries depr√©s de la perceptiva demanda de conciliaci√≥. Ens veiem al jutjat, Luis‚Äù, li va respondre. La informaci√≥n publicada por Alvise sobre m√≠ es absolutamente falsa. No tengo nada que ver con la cuenta ‚ÄúElJudiodeVox‚Äù Por ello, voy a interponer una querella por injurias tras la previa y preceptiva demanda de conciliaci√≥n que exige la Lecrim. Nos vemos en el juzgado, Luis. ‚Äî Paul Daniel Axinte (@paulsito) [May 21, 2024]

title: ÁæéÂàùÈ¢ÜÂ§±‰∏öÈáëÂíå‰ΩèÊàøÊï∞ÊçÆÊ¨†‰Ω≥ È¢ÑÁ§∫ÁªèÊµéÊîæÁºìÔºü
text:
„ÄêÂ§ßÁ∫™ÂÖÉ2025Âπ¥06Êúà19Êó•ËÆØ„ÄëÔºàÂ§ßÁ∫™ÂÖÉËÆ∞ËÄÖÁßãÁîüÁªºÂêàÊä•ÂØºÔºâ‰∏äÂë®Ôºà6Êúà8Êó•-14Êó•ÔºâÔºåÁæéÂõΩÂÖ¨Â∏É‰∏§È°πÁªèÊµéÊï∞ÊçÆ„ÄÇÂÖ∂‰∏≠È¶ñÊ¨°Áî≥ËØ∑Â§±‰∏öÊïëÊµéÁöÑ‰∫∫Êï∞ÊúâÊâÄ‰∏ãÈôçÔºå‰ΩÜ‰ªçË°®Êòé6Êúà‰ªΩÂä≥Âä®ÂäõÂ∏ÇÂú∫Âú®Ëøõ‰∏ÄÊ≠•ÂáèÂº±ÔºõËÄå5ÊúàÊñ∞Â±ãÂºÄÂ∑•ÈôçËá≥5Âπ¥‰ΩéÁÇπ„ÄÇËøô‰∫õÊï∞ÊçÆÂèØËÉΩÈ¢ÑÁ§∫ÁæéÂõΩÁªèÊµéÊ¥ªÂä®Âú®ÊîæÁºì„ÄÇ
Âä≥Â∑•ÈÉ®Âë®‰∏âÔºà6Êúà18Êó•ÔºâÂÖ¨Â∏ÉÁöÑÊä•ÂëäÊòæÁ§∫ÔºåÂâç‰∏ÄÂë®Ë£ÅÂëòÁé∞Ë±°ÊôÆÈÅçÔºåÂØºËá¥Â§±‰∏öÊïëÊµéÁî≥ËØ∑‰∫∫Êï∞ÂçáËá≥ÂÖ´‰∏™ÊúàÊù•Êñ∞È´ò„ÄÇÂ∞ΩÁÆ°Áî≥ËØ∑‰∫∫Êï∞‰∏äÂçáÊòØÁî±‰∏Ä‰∫õÊäÄÊúØÂõ†Á¥†ÊâÄÂØºËá¥Ôºå‰ΩÜ‰ªäÂπ¥Ë£ÅÂëò‰∫∫Êï∞‰∏ÄÁõ¥Âú®‰∏äÂçá„ÄÇ
Êà™Ëá≥6Êúà14Êó•ÂΩìÂë®ÔºåÂàùÊ¨°Áî≥ËØ∑Â∑ûÂ§±‰∏öÊïëÊµéÈáë‰∫∫Êï∞‰∏ãÈôç5,000‰∫∫ÔºåÊØîÂâç‰∏ÄÂë®ÈôçËá≥24.5‰∏á‰∫∫ÔºåÁ¨¶ÂêàÂ∏ÇÂú∫È¢ÑÊúü„ÄÇËÄåÂâç‰∏ÄÂë®ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆË¢´‰øÆÊ≠£ÔºåÊòæÁ§∫ÊØîÊ≠§ÂâçÊä•ÂëäÂ§ö2,000‰∫∫Áî≥ËØ∑Ôºå‰ΩøËØ•Âë®ÁöÑÁî≥ËØ∑‰∫∫Êï∞ÂçáËá≥ÂéªÂπ¥10Êúà‰ª•Êù•ÁöÑÊúÄÈ´òÊ∞¥Âπ≥„ÄÇ
Ë∑ØÈÄèÁ§æÈááËÆøÁöÑÁªèÊµéÂ≠¶ÂÆ∂Ê≠§ÂâçÈ¢ÑËÆ°Ôºå‰∏äÂë®ÂàùÈ¢ÜÂ§±‰∏öÊïëÊµéÈáë‰∫∫Êï∞‰∏∫24.5‰∏á‰∫∫„ÄÇ
Ââç‰∏ÄÂë®ÔºåÂ§ö‰∏™Â∑ûÂ§ö‰∏™Ë°å‰∏öÊä•ÂëäË£ÅÂëòÊÉÖÂÜµÔºåÂåÖÊã¨ËøêËæì„ÄÅ‰ªìÂÇ®„ÄÅ‰ΩèÂÆøÂíåÈ§êÈ•ÆÊúçÂä°„ÄÅÂÜú‰∏ö„ÄÅÂª∫Á≠ëÂíåÂà∂ÈÄ†‰∏öÁ≠âË°å‰∏ö„ÄÇ
ÂâîÈô§Â≠£ËäÇÊÄßÊ≥¢Âä®ÁöÑÂõõÂë®ÁßªÂä®Âπ≥ÂùáÂÄº‰∏äÂë®ÂàùÈ¢ÜÂ§±‰∏öÈáë‰∫∫Êï∞Â¢ûÂä†‰∫Ü4,750‰∫∫ÔºåËææÂà∞245,500‰∫∫Ôºå‰∏∫2023Âπ¥8Êúà‰ª•Êù•ÁöÑÊúÄÈ´òÊ∞¥Âπ≥ÔºåÊòæÁ§∫Âä≥Âä®Â∏ÇÂú∫Âä®ËÉΩÊåÅÁª≠ÊîæÁºì„ÄÇ
ÁÑ∂ËÄåÔºå‰∏Ä‰∫õÁªèÊµéÂ≠¶ÂÆ∂ËÆ§‰∏∫ÔºåÂä≥Âä®ÂäõÂ∏ÇÂú∫Âπ∂Êú™ÂèëÁîüÂ§™Â§ßÂèòÂåñ„ÄÇ
Âë®‰∏âÂèëÂ∏ÉÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÊ∂µÁõñ‰∫ÜÊîøÂ∫úË∞ÉÊü•‰ºÅ‰∏ö‰ª•ÁºñÂà∂6ÊúàÂ∞±‰∏öÊä•Âëä‰∏≠ÈùûÂÜúÂ∞±‰∏öÊï∞ÊçÆÁöÑÊúüÈó¥„ÄÇÂú®5ÊúàÂíå6ÊúàË∞ÉÊü•Âë®ÊúüÔºåÁî≥ËØ∑‰∫∫Êï∞ÊúâÊâÄÂ¢ûÂä†„ÄÇ
Èõá‰∏ªÂõ†ÁªèÊµéÁéØÂ¢É‰∏çÁ°ÆÂÆöËÄåÁäπË±´‰∏çÂÜ≥ÔºåÂØºËá¥ÊãõËÅòÊ¥ªÂä®Áñ≤ËΩØ„ÄÇ
5Êúà‰ªΩÈùûÂÜúÂ∞±‰∏ö‰∫∫Êï∞Â¢ûÂä†13.9‰∏áÔºåËÄåÂéªÂπ¥ÂêåÊúü‰∏∫19.3‰∏á„ÄÇ
‰∏ãÂë®Â∞ÜÂÖ¨Â∏ÉÁöÑÂàùÊ¨°Áî≥ËØ∑Â§±‰∏öÊïëÊµé‰∫∫Êï∞Êï∞ÊçÆÔºåÂèØËÉΩ‰∏∫ÂàÜÊûê6Êúà‰ªΩÂä≥Âä®ÂäõÂ∏ÇÂú∫Áä∂ÂÜµÊèê‰æõÊõ¥Â§öÂèÇËÄÉ„ÄÇ
ÊåÅÁª≠Áî≥ËØ∑Â§±‰∏öÊïëÊµé‰∫∫Êï∞Âú®Êà™Ëá≥6Êúà7Êó•ÁöÑ‰∏ÄÂë®ÂÜÖ‰∏ãÈôç6000‰∫∫ÔºåÁªèÂ≠£ËäÇÊÄßË∞ÉÊï¥Âêé‰ªçÈ´òËææ194.5‰∏á‰∫∫„ÄÇËøëÊúüË¢´Ë£ÅÂëòÂ∑•Ê≠£Èù¢‰∏¥Â∞±‰∏öÂõ∞Èöæ„ÄÇ
Âí®ËØ¢ÂÖ¨Âè∏È´òÈ¢ëÁªèÊµéÔºàHigh Frequency EconomicsÔºâÈ¶ñÂ∏≠ÁªèÊµéÂ≠¶ÂÆ∂Âç°Â∞î‚ÄßÊ∏©‰ºØÊ†ºÔºàCarl WeinbergÔºâË°®Á§∫Ôºå‚ÄúÂ∞ΩÁÆ°Áî≥ËØ∑‰∫∫Êï∞‰ªçÂ§Ñ‰∫éÂéÜÂè≤‰Ωé‰ΩçÔºå‰ΩÜÊàë‰ª¨‰∏çËÉΩÂÜçÂê¶ËÆ§ÔºåÊ≠£Â¶ÇÊàë‰ª¨È¢ÑÊúüÁöÑÈÇ£Ê†∑ÔºåÁî≥ËØ∑‰∫∫Êï∞Ê≠£Âú®‰∏äÂçáÔºåÁªèÊµéÂ∞ÜÊîæÁºìÂπ∂ËøõÂÖ•Êî∂Áº©Áä∂ÊÄÅ„ÄÇ‚Äù
‰∏éÊ≠§ÂêåÊó∂Ôºå5Êúà‰ªΩÊú™Êù•ÂçïÊà∑‰ΩèÊàøÂª∫Á≠ëËÆ∏ÂèØËØÅÊï∞ÈáèË∑åËá≥‰∏§Âπ¥Êù•ÊúÄ‰ΩéÊ∞¥Âπ≥„ÄÇÁæéÂõΩÂïÜÂä°ÈÉ®‰∫∫Âè£ÊôÆÊü•Â±ÄÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰ªΩÁã¨Á´ãÊä•ÂëäÊòæÁ§∫Ôºå5ÊúàÂçïÊà∑‰ΩèÂÆÖÊú™Êù•Âª∫ËÆæËÆ∏ÂèØËØÅÂèëÊîæÈáè‰∏ãÈôç2.7%ÔºåÁªèÂ≠£ËäÇÊÄßË∞ÉÊï¥ÂêéÁöÑÂπ¥ÂåñÁéá89.8‰∏áÂ•óÔºå‰∏∫2023Âπ¥4Êúà‰ª•Êù•ÁöÑÊúÄ‰ΩéÊ∞¥Âπ≥„ÄÇ
ÂÖ®ÁæéÊàøÂ±ãÂª∫Á≠ëÂïÜÂçè‰ºöÔºàNational Association of Home BuildersÔºâÂë®‰∫åÁöÑ‰∏ÄÈ°πË∞ÉÊü•ÊòæÁ§∫Ôºå6Êúà‰ªΩÁã¨Ê†ã‰ΩèÂÆÖÂª∫Á≠ëÂïÜÁöÑ‰ø°ÂøÉÊåáÊï∞Ë∑åËá≥2Âπ¥Âçä‰ª•Êù•ÁöÑÊúÄ‰ΩéÊ∞¥Âπ≥„ÄÇ
ÂÄüË¥∑ÊàêÊú¨‰∏äÂçá‰ΩøÊΩúÂú®‰π∞ÂÆ∂ÊúõËÄåÂç¥Ê≠•ÔºåÂØºËá¥Êú™ÂîÆÊàøÂ±ãÂ∫ìÂ≠òËøáÂâ©ÔºåÊé®Âä®Â∏ÇÂú∫‰∏äÊñ∞ÂçïÊà∑‰ΩèÂÆÖ‰æõÂ∫îÈáèÂçáËá≥2007Âπ¥Â∫ï‰ª•Êù•ÁöÑÊúÄÈ´òÊ∞¥Âπ≥„ÄÇËøô‰ΩøÂæóÂª∫Á≠ëÂïÜÂá†‰πéÊ≤°ÊúâÂä®ÂäõÂêØÂä®Êñ∞ÁöÑ‰ΩèÊàøÈ°πÁõÆ„ÄÇ
ÁæéËÅîÂÇ®Ôºàthe Federal ReserveÔºâÂ§öÊ¨°ÊãíÁªù‰∫ÜÂ∑ùÊôÆÔºàÁâπÊúóÊôÆÔºâÊÄªÁªüÈôçÊÅØÁöÑË¶ÅÊ±Ç„ÄÇÁæéËÅîÂÇ®Âë®‰∏âÂ∞ÜÂü∫ÂáÜÈöîÂ§úÂà©ÁéáÁª¥ÊåÅÂú®4.25%ÔΩû4.50%ÁöÑËåÉÂõ¥ÂÜÖÔºåÁªßÁª≠Áª¥ÊåÅ12Êúà‰ª•Êù•ÁöÑÊ∞¥Âπ≥„ÄÇ
ÔºàÊú¨ÊñáÂèÇËÄÉ‰∫ÜË∑ØÈÄèÁ§æÁöÑÊä•ÂØºÔºâ
Ë¥£‰ªªÁºñËæëÔºöÂè∂Á¥´ÂæÆ#
